transport-options.required: Tell us how you will arrive
transport-options.equal: Please select an option from the list

flight-number.required: Enter the flight number you will be arriving in the UK on
flight-number.too-long: Your flight number is too long. Please check your travel documents and enter it correctly
flight-number.format: A flight number has 2 or 3 letters or numbers representing the airline followed by 1 to 4 numbers and sometimes an extra letter at the end, for example KU101. Please check your travel documents and re-enter

arrival-date.required: Enter the time your flight is due to land in the UK in 24 hour format HH:MM
arrival-date.invalid: Enter the time your flight is due to land in the UK in 24 hour format HH:MM
arrival-date.within-48-hours: Date of arrival must be at least 48 hours from now
arrival-date.too-far-in-future: Date of arrival in the UK must be no more than 3 months from now

is-this-your-flight.equal: Please select an option from the list

accept-declaration.required: Please indicate that you agree to the declaration

departure-date.invalid: Select a valid date you will depart for the UK
departure-date.in-past: The date your flight to the UK takes off cannot be more than 1 day before it arrives in the UK
departure-date.in-future: The date your flight to the UK takes off cannot be after the date it arrives in the UK

departure-time.departure-after-arrival: Your departure cannot be after your arrival
departure-time.departure-too-far-before-arrival: The date your flight to the UK takes off cannot be more than 24 hours before it arrives in the UK
